page.title: 10Games we play in Heolgerrig.
page.content: The most popular game in our school is the snail,quite a few people play it,especially class one and two,it is painted on our school yard in yellow paint and looks like a snail shell with large squares on it. These are there because the players have to hop on one foot in the squares without touching the lines with hands or feet.You have to hop on one foot until you reach the finishing space,there you can have a short rest before you hop back to the start to get a square.The square that you have earned will have to be jumped by the other players,but when it is your turn again you have to jump other players squares and land on your own squares, on the way to the finish and on the way back.
